title: Levi's® 505® Regular Dark Stonewash 31 30
description: The classic Levi's Mens 505 Regular look that's always in style.
505 jeans fit comfortably straight through the seat, thigh and leg.
Straight-cut waistband sits at the waist.
Sits evenly on both the front and back.

The classic Levi's Mens 505 Regular look that's always in style. 505 jeans fit comfortably straight through the seat, thigh and leg. Straight-cut waistband sits at the waist. Sits evenly on both the front and back. Classic, five-pocket design. Branding-stamped rivet and shank button-detailing. "Levi's" or trademark-branded red tab at back pocket. Leather brand patch at back waist. Signature arcuate stitch at back pockets. Belt-loop waistband. Zip fly and button closure. 100% cotton except on noted washes. Nail Loop Knot, Birdman, Clif, Goldentop, Hawker, Stonewash Stretch: 99% cotton, 1% elastane. Afrobeat Stretch, Caraway Slub Twill 1, Cash, Moss Black Overdye, Navarro: 98% cotton, 2% elastane. Flying Bird: 99% cotton, 1% elastane. Kansas: 94% cotton, 5% polyester, 1% elastane. Roth: 88% cotton, 11% polyester, 1% elastane. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.
